title: Stimulating the vagus nerve in the neck might help ease pain associated with PTSD

title_detail.value: Stimulating the vagus nerve in the neck might help ease pain associated with PTSD

summary: In a randomized, controlled pilot trial, researchers found that participants pre-treated with noninvasive vagus nerve stimulation experienced less pain after heat stimulus than mock-treated participants.
